dataExports.title: [JA] Data Exports
dataExports.description: [JA] Request exports of your personal data for GDPR compliance
dataExports.yourDataRightsDescription: [JA] Under GDPR Article 20, you have the right to receive your personal data in a structured, commonly used, and machine-readable format. Exports are processed within 30 days and remain available for download for 30 days after completion.
dataExports.noActiveExportsDescription: [JA] Request an export to see its status here

format.description: [JA] Your data is exported in JSON (JavaScript Object Notation) format, which is:
format.machineReadable: [JA] Machine-readable and portable as required by GDPR
format.humanReadable: [JA] Human-readable when opened in a text editor
format.compatible: [JA] Compatible with most data processing tools
format.easyImport: [JA] Easy to import into other services

faq.howLong: [JA] How long does an export take?
faq.howLongAnswer: [JA] Most exports complete within a few minutes. Complex requests with large amounts of data may take longer, but GDPR allows up to 30 days for processing.
faq.howLongAvailable: [JA] How long is an export available?
faq.howLongAvailableAnswer: [JA] Completed exports are available for download for 30 days. After this period, you'll need to request a new export.
faq.howOften: [JA] How often can I request an export?
faq.howOftenAnswer: [JA] You can request one export per 24 hours. This helps ensure system resources are available for all users.
faq.isSecureAnswer: [JA] Yes. Exports are only accessible to you and require authentication to download. Sensitive data like passwords and API key secrets are never included in exports.

systemPrompt.title: システムプロンプト
systemPrompt.description: エージェントの性格と行動を定義する
systemPrompt.placeholder:
あなたは、次のことに焦点を当てた専門の調査エージェントです。 

あなたの能力には以下が含まれます:
 - GWI ソースからの消費者データの分析
 - パターンと傾向の特定
 - 実用的な洞察の生成

 応答するとき:
 - 常にデータソースを引用する
 - 洞察の信頼レベルを提供する
 - ヘッダーを使用して応答を明確に構造化する
systemPrompt.hint: エージェントの性格、能力、応答形式を定義します。 データ処理と出力構造については具体的に説明してください。
